EmailTemplate.description: FREE tools to help you promote cloud accounting to your clients
EmailTemplate.name: Grow client base My Marketing
EmailTemplate.subject: FREE tools to help you promote cloud accounting to your clients
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Create new value-add services using our special 4.99 offer
View this email in your browser
Ready-made marketing tools to save you time
Finding time to promote cloud accounting to your clients can be time-consuming … until now.
Located in the ProAdvisor Partner Portal, there’s a range of ready-to-use emails, web pages, flyers, web banners and more to help you grow your practice by moving your clients to the cloud.
So if you want to send out an email, add a banner to your website or run a client event, all you need to do is add your logo, add the relevant detail and you’re ready to go!
Learn how to create your own email campaign here
If you need any assistance with the marketing tools in the Portal, please call us on 1800 618 521 and we’ll gladly help you out.
Thanks!
QuickBooks Online ProAdvisor Team
You're receiving this email because you have provided Intuit your details or have been referred by a colleague.
unsubscribe from this list
Intuit Australia Level 13, 2 Park Street SYDNEY NSW 2000
